UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile in the application.

uid.description: The user's unique ID from Firebase Authentication.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

coins.description: The number of coins the user has.

referralCode.description: A unique code for referring other users.

isAdmin.description: Whether the user has administrative privileges.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public and private user profile information.
